description: James Pendleton has become a man of surprises, I didn’t expect him to agree to do this shoot, but he was well up for it and judging by how much he cums he really enjoyed himself! Who better to fuck than man of experience and power bottom naughty Chris, the two lads are great together and have lots of fun fucking!
title: Bonus Video of James Pendleton's Photo Shoot - Straight Lad Fucks 1st Guy - Lucky Chris!
